description: Canoe Ride in Nictau Lake. Located in Mount Carleton Provincial park NB. You can take a full day of Canoeing in the large lake . The water is clear and calm . Good for beginners. Canoes can be rented locally and delivered to launch site . Information available at the entry to the park. This activity can be combined with hiking & mountain climbing in the park.
directions: Located in The Mount Carleton Provincial Park . Directions available at the entrance to park .
title: Nictau Lake -Mount Caleton Provincial Park
